/* myOrderMapper.selectMyOrderDetail */ SELECT a.odNo ,a.odDate ,a.rcAddrOne ,a.rcAddrTwo ,a.rcPhone ,a.rcEmail ,a.rcNm ,a.odState ,a.gdQty ,a.odAmt ,a.gdNm
,'-' as trDate
,t.TR_DATE as trDate
FROM(SELECT o.OD_NO AS odNo ,o.OD_DATE AS odDate ,o.RC_ADDR_ONE AS rcAddrOne ,o.RC_ADDR_TWO AS rcAddrTwo ,o.RC_PHONE AS rcPhone ,o.RC_EMAIL AS rcEmail ,o.RC_NM AS rcNm ,DECODE(o.OD_STATE,'100','주문완료','200','주문취소','300','배송중','400','배송완료') AS odState ,LISTAGG(o.GD_QTY, ',') AS gdQty ,LISTAGG(o.OD_AMT, ',') AS odAmt ,LISTAGG(g.GD_NM, ',') AS gdNm FROM ORDER_INFO o LEFT OUTER JOIN GOODS_INFO g ON g.GD_NO= o.GD_NO WHERE CS_NO = #{userNo} AND OD_NO = #{odNo} GROUP BY o.OD_NO,o.OD_STATE,o.OD_DATE,o.RC_ADDR_ONE,o.RC_ADDR_TWO,o.RC_PHONE,o.RC_EMAIL,o.RC_NM)a
LEFT OUTER JOIN TRANSFER_INFO t ON t.OD_NO= a.odNo
